00035 ConfigMenu::ConfigMenu(void)
00036   : Menu("cli-config", Help()
00037         .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "CLI settings menu")),
00038     m_pcliEcho(NULL), m_pcliEchoOn(NULL), m_pcliEchoOff(NULL),
00039     m_pcliBeep(NULL), m_pcliBeepOn(NULL), m_pcliBeepOff(NULL)
00040 {
00041 }
00042 
00043 ConfigMenu::~ConfigMenu(void)
00044 {
00045 }
00046 
00047 void ConfigMenu::SetCli(Cli& CLI_Cli)
00048 {
00049     Menu::SetCli(CLI_Cli);
00050     {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Modify echo behavior"));
00051         m_pcliEcho = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("echo", cli_Help)));
00052         {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set echo on"));
00053             m_pcliEchoOn = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliEcho->AddElement(new Keyword("on", cli_Help)));
00054             m_pcliEchoOn->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00055         {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set echo off"));
00056             m_pcliEchoOff = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliEcho->AddElement(new Keyword("off", cli_Help)));
00057             m_pcliEchoOff->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }}
00058     {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Modify beep behavior"));
00059         m_pcliBeep = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("beep", cli_Help)));
00060         {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set beep on"));
00061             m_pcliBeepOn = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliBeep->AddElement(new Keyword("on", cli_Help)));
00062             m_pcliBeepOn->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00063         {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set beep off"));
00064             m_pcliBeepOff = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliBeep->AddElement(new Keyword("off", cli_Help)));
00065             m_pcliBeepOff->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }}
00066 }
00067 
00068 const bool ConfigMenu::ExecuteReserved(const CommandLine& CLI_CmdLine) const
00069 {
00070     int i_CmdLineIndex = 0;
00071     const cli::Element* pcli_Element = NULL;
00072     #define CLI_STEP_IT() do { if (i_CmdLineIndex >= CLI_CmdLine.GetElementCount()) return false; pcli_Element = & CLI_CmdLine[i_CmdLineIndex++]; } while(0)
00073 
00074     CLI_STEP_IT();
00075     if (0) {}
00076     else if (pcli_Element == & GetEchoNode())
00077     {
00078         CLI_STEP_IT();
00079         if (0) {}
00080         else if (pcli_Element == & GetEchoOnNode())
00081         {
00082             CLI_STEP_IT();
00083             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(pcli_Element))
00084             {
00085                 EchoOn();
00086                 return true;
00087             }
00088         }
00089         else if (pcli_Element == & GetEchoOffNode())
00090         {
00091             CLI_STEP_IT();
00092             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(pcli_Element))
00093             {
00094                 EchoOff();
00095                 return true;
00096             }
00097         }
00098     }
00099     else if (pcli_Element == & GetBeepNode())
00100     {
00101         CLI_STEP_IT();
00102         if (0) {}
00103         else if (pcli_Element == & GetBeepOnNode())
00104         {
00105             CLI_STEP_IT();
00106             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(pcli_Element))
00107             {
00108                 BeepOn();
00109                 return true;
00110             }
00111         }
00112         else if (pcli_Element == & GetBeepOffNode())
00113         {
00114             CLI_STEP_IT();
00115             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(pcli_Element))
00116             {
00117                 BeepOff();
00118                 return true;
00119             }
00120         }
00121     }
00122 
00123     return Menu::ExecuteReserved(CLI_CmdLine);
00124 }
00125 
00126 const bool ConfigMenu::Execute(const CommandLine& CLI_CmdLine) const
00127 {
00128     return false;
00129 }
00130 
00131 void ConfigMenu::EchoOn(void) const
00132 {
00133     GetShell().EnableStream(ECHO_STREAM, true);
00134     GetOutputStream() << "echo is on" << endl;
00135 }
00136 
00137 void ConfigMenu::EchoOff(void) const
00138 {
00139     GetShell().EnableStream(ECHO_STREAM, false);
00140     GetOutputStream() << "echo is off" << endl;
00141 }
00142 
00143 void ConfigMenu::BeepOn(void) const
00144 {
00145     GetShell().SetBeep(true);
00146     GetOutputStream() << "beep is on" << endl;
00147 }
00148 
00149 void ConfigMenu::BeepOff(void) const
00150 {
00151     GetShell().SetBeep(false);
00152     GetOutputStream() << "beep is off" << endl;
00153 }

00155 Keyword& ConfigMenu::GetEchoNode(void)
00156 {
00157     return *m_pcliEcho;
00158 }
00159 
00160 const Keyword& ConfigMenu::GetEchoNode(void) const
00161 {
00162     return *m_pcliEcho;
00163 }

00166 {
00167     return *m_pcliEchoOn;

00171 {
00172     return *m_pcliEchoOn;
00173 }

00181 {
00182     return *m_pcliEchoOff;
